summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to street-food vending, merchandise displays, and sidewalk cafes; amending various sections of and adding sections to Titles 11 and 15 of the Seattle Municipal Code; repealing Chapter 10.10, and Sections 10.03.110, 15.17.010, and 15.17.020; amending the current Seattle Department of Transportation Street Use fee schedule by adding new vending-related Street Use permit use codes and amending vending-related Street Use permit fees.
